wikipedia_page.main: Mark Simpkin (born 18 September 1972, Ashton, Cheshire) is an English television presenter and entrepreneur with a diverse business portfolio encompassing product supply and distribution, property development, a luxury travel business and Englands largest private natural burial ground.
